hr.caellian.flow.network

Interface Network

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NetworkBase

    public interface Network
    Network is consisted out of Network Components capable of communicating with each other.

    Networks allow updating only specific components instead of all of them which is a big optimization for certain systems. They can also request certain components to be loaded or unloaded if their container requires it.

    Since:
    1.0.0
